txt.en: When inspiring your Shield-brother, the rest of the fellowship also gains a small boon.
Your Inspire (Song-brother) and To Arms (Song-brother) apply 20% of their benefit to your Fellowship.
Your Inspire (Song-brother) and To Arms (Song-brother) apply 40% of their benefit to your Fellowship.
Your Inspire (Song-brother) and To Arms (Song-brother) apply 60% of their benefit to your Fellowship.
